                           java.lang.String location,
                           float duration,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation interp,
                           int offset,
                           java.lang.Runnable... runnable)
        An interpolation method that can be used on actors to slide them in from different directions.
        Parameters:
        actor - actor to slide in
        location - location (left, right, top, down)
        duration - duration of slide-in
        interp - interpolation method to be used
        offset - offset of actor off the screen
        runnable - on-finish runnable

        duration - duration of slide-out
        interp - interpolation method to be used

      • sequenceSlideIn

                                   float duration,

                                   float delay,
                                   com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor... actors)
        Slide in multiple actors at once, option to have a delay in between to stagger
        Parameters:
        location - (left, right, top, down)
        duration - length of total slide-in
        interp - interpolation method to be used
        offset - offset off the screen
        delay - delay between actor interps
        actors - actors to be used
